title: simopnbfu
author: simopnbfu
content: In the last 2 years my life has taken a dark turn.I lost my business with a debt of about 300000 USD (about 1.5 mil Ron, my home country currency) .I have managed to repay about 123000 usd . In the process I lost my home, my car, my marriage and most of my family and friends despise me now.I need a loan in btc for the rest of the amount so I can have a semblance of recovery.I can and will repay it in a year with interest.Plead help. I really don't have any other ideas on how to fix my issues at the moment, and the debt is racking up interest at a rate I am afraid I cannot cover in a timely manner.The only thing left to lose is my life.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: simopnbfu on October 04, 2022, 07:49:33 AMThe only thing left to lose is my life.I think it is the best option for you as there is no one who can send 177000$ to an unknown person.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: simopnbfu on October 04, 2022, 07:49:33 AMPlead help. I really don't have any other ideas on how to fix my issues at the moment, and the debt is racking up interest at a rate I am afraid I cannot cover in a timely manner.The only thing left to lose is my life.You have to think on something else. Like getting a job.Or get one of the old business partners help you. Or get your friends to better sentiments, if they are indeed friends.Losing your life is the ultimately wrong move. With enough willingness and good health money can be recovered. Not easy, since it's a very big amount, still...However, asking for such a huge a donation from unknown people is not the way to go, no matter how desperate or dramatic you are.And, let's be honest, since you cannot provide any proper collateral, what you're asking is a donation, not a loan.

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: simopnbfu on October 04, 2022, 07:49:33 AMI need a loan in btc for the rest of the amount so I can have a semblance of recovery.I can and will repay it in a year with interest.If you claim to be able to repay in a year, then you obviously have a plan to do that. Use that as a step to build, if the debt You owe is due before a year, take out a farther loan as you work to pay the most pressing one and prevent accumulating interests, while working on your plan.This is your best plan. No one is going to give you the amount you seek here, no matter how sympathetic your story is. If that was the case, everyone would have a sob story.- Jay -

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: simopnbfu on October 04, 2022, 07:49:33 AMI need a loan in btc for the rest of the amount so I can have a semblance of recovery.I can and will repay it in a year with interest.are you aware that bitcoin can double in value in a year? So your loan would not amount to $177k but to $354k. isn't that too much of a risk for someone in your position? you haven't written who exactly you owe, the bank, the state, business associates, or friends. if you promise here that you can pay it back in a year surely those to whom you owe will have the understanding to give you some air.
